name: Paranoia (itch) (Nick Mudry)
description:
Paranoia is an eerie puzzle game that was built by Adam Roy, Mike Flood, and Nick Mudry during the 2013 Global Game Jam. 

The game features a handful of puzzles that you must complete while navigating a dark room, while avoiding “The One.” Escape and avoid being captured! 

Sound queues may help with some puzzles, so headphones and speakers are recommended! 

Installation Instructions:

As a note, this game was created in 2013 using Microsoft's XNA Framework. Included in the game files is the XNA Framework 4.0 Redistributable for Microsoft, please make sure you install that before opening the game file! 

Keyboard Controls:

  • Move - Arrow Keys or WASD
  • Interact - Space Bar
  • Revert to Last Checkpoint - R

Xbox Controller Controls:

  • Move - Joystick or D-Pad
  • Interact - A
  • Revert to Last Checkpoint - B

Credits:

  • Adam Roy - Programming, Game Design
  • Mike Flood - Art, Level Design, Game Design, Programming
  • Nick Mudry - Audio, Game Design

This game is free to download and play.
